Team & Partners

Project Coordination

Dr. Agusti Alentorn

Scientific Coordinator

Paris Brain Institute (ICM)

MD, PhD - Senior Neurologist, Principal Investigator specializing in neuro-oncology research

Prof. Francois Ducray

Clinical Co-Lead

Hospices Civils de Lyon

Expert in neuro-oncology, coordinates multi-center projects including PRT-K ProGlio

Prof. Stephanie Debette

SVD Lead

ICM / VBHI Bordeaux

International expert on SVD, leads ISGC and CHARGE consortia

Work Package Leaders

Prof. Maria Vakalopoulou

WP2 Lead - Multimodal AI

CentraleSupelec, Univ. Paris-Saclay

Expert in computational pathology and multimodal cancer analytics

Prof. Stergios Christodoulidis

WP2 Co-Lead

CentraleSupelec, Univ. Paris-Saclay

Specialist in whole-slide imaging and weakly supervised learning

Prof. Aymeric Dieuleveut

WP3 Lead - Federated Learning

Ecole Polytechnique

Expert in federated optimization and privacy-preserving learning

Prof. Vicky Kalogeiton

WP2 Contributor

Ecole Polytechnique

Expert in multimodal and cross-modal learning

Dr. Carole Lartizien

WP2 Contributor

INSA Lyon / CREATIS

Expert in AI methods for multimodal medical image analysis

Dr. Olivier Colliot

WP1 Contributor

ICM / CNRS

Expert in neuroimaging and machine learning

Partner Institutions

Paris Brain Institute (ICM)

Ecole Polytechnique (IP Paris)

CentraleSupelec, Univ. Paris-Saclay

Hospices Civils de Lyon

Universite de Bordeaux / VBHI

CNRS Rhone-Auvergne

AP-HP (Paris Public Hospitals)

INSA Lyon / CREATIS

International Collaborations: BRAINTWIN also collaborates with international consortia including ISGC (International Stroke Genomic Consortium) and CHARGE for external validation and federated learning across borders.

Research Units

BRAINTWIN draws expertise from numerous research labs and units:

  • Centre de Mathematiques Laurent Schwartz (Ecole Polytechnique)
  • DMU AP-HP.Sorbonne Neurosciences
  • Ecole des Neurosciences de Bordeaux
  • Federation de Mathematiques de CentraleSupelec
  • Institut du Cerveau (ICM)
  • Laboratoire d'Informatique de l'Ecole Polytechnique
  • Laboratoire de Mathematiques de l'INSA
  • CREATIS - Medical Imaging Research Center

Join the Team

We are looking for talented PhD students, postdocs, and engineers to join the BRAINTWIN project.

View Open Positions
BRAINTWIN

Brain Research through Advanced INTegration with Wide-scale Intelligent Networks. Building digital twins for precision neurology.
